name: Dondozo
description: The Big Catfish Pokémon. This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: When this Pokémon attacks an opponent, it ignores any stat changes the opponent has been affected with after the start of battle.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to burning.
